neurozine.title: Unlock Your Cognitive Potential
neurozine.description: This isn't just cognitive support—it's your key to unlocking a state of peak mental performance. Neurozine® is engineered for the high-achiever seeking the laser focus, rapid recall, and profound mental clarity required to gain a competitive edge in work and in life.
benefits: Mental clarity that cuts through brain fog
Cognitive performance that sets you apart

serophan.title: Precision Neurotransmitter Synthesis
serophan.description: Don't disrupt your biology—support it. Serophan® provides the pure, essential building block your body uses to naturally create serotonin. The result is balanced mood, restful sleep, and a state of calm well-being, without the side effects or complexities of pharmaceutical interventions.†
benefits: Natural mood balance without pharmaceutical disruption
Sleep quality that transforms your recovery
Appetite regulation that supports healthy weight

pureplantd3.title: Cellular Genomic Optimization
pureplantd3.description: Your body runs on Vitamin D. That's why we perfected it. Pure, pine-derived, and bioidentical to the D3 your body makes from the sun, PurePlantD3® delivers foundational support for robust immunity, strong bones, and a positive mood. All without a trace of sheep's grease.
benefits: Bone strength that lasts a lifetime
Immune function that protects and enhances
Muscle strength that improves with age
